snippet: Attorney General Eric T. Schneiderman had previously criticized Amphastar Pharmaceuticals for doubling the price of naloxone, which is used by many government agencies to reverse overdoses.
abstract: New York State Atty Gen Eric T Schneiderman is expected to announce agreement with Amphastar Pharmaceuticals to offset increased price for naloxone, drug that is used to reverse heroin overdoses; Schneiderman had characterized sharp increase as unacceptable.
lead_paragraph: Attorney General Eric T. Schneiderman had previously criticized Amphastar Pharmaceuticals for doubling the price of naloxone, which is used by many government agencies to reverse overdoses.

headline.main: New York State Attorney General Reaches Deal to Reduce Price of Heroin Antidote
headline.print_headline: State Attorney General Reaches Deal to Curb the Price of a Heroin Antidote
